messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What percentage of the skill list is dedicated to Psychology?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What percentage of the skill list is dedicated to Accounting?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What percentage of the skill list is dedicated to Pilot?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What percentage of the skill list is dedicated to Rifle?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can be detected when inspecting the books of a company?
cheated employees, siphoned-off funds, payment of bribes or blackmail, and whether the financial condition is better or worse than claimed
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How can one see the financial history of a company through old accounts?
how money was gained or lost in the past (grain, slave-trading, whiskey-running, etc.) and to whom and for what payment was made
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What skill level would be required to conceal something in financial records?
the Accountancy skill of the person doing the concealing
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the general difficulty level required to inspect financial records?
comprehensive and well-documented
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does Anthropology enable users to do?
identify and understand an individual's way of life through observation
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can be predicted about an extinct culture's ways and morals through incomplete evidence?
simple predictions can be made
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the difficulty level for Anthropology when the skill-user spends a month or more with the people?
regular difficulty
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the difficulty level for Anthropology when the skill-user spends only a week or less with the people?
hard difficulty
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is required to make simple predictions about a culture's ways and morals?
Observing another culture from within for a time or working from accurate records concerning an extinct culture.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How long does an anthropologist need to study a culture to understand its functions?
A month or more.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if an investigator fails a pushed roll?
discussions between investigators and third parties alert some enemy faction to the investigators' intentions
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What might happen if an insane investigator fails a pushed roll?
he or she might be found having partially eaten the accounts.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What skill is most commonly applied to dogs?
Animal Handling
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What skill is used for breaking in and controlling horses or camels?
Ride skill
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the primary animal the skill is most commonly applied to?
dogs
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What skill is used for breaking in and controlling mounts like horses or camels?
Ride skill
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is an example of a pushed roll in a skill challenge?
taking more time to study the target/s
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What could be a consequence of failing a pushed roll in a skill challenge?
being at-
